GraphStorm
  • graphstorm.inferer
  • View page source

graphstorm.infererÔÉÅ

GraphStorm inferers assemble the distributed inference pipeline for different tasks.

If possible, users should always use these inferers to avoid handling the distributed processing and tasks.

GSgnnLinkPredictionInfer

Link prediction infer.

GSgnnNodePredictionInfer

Node classification/regression infer.

GSgnnEdgePredictionInfer

Edge classification/regression infer.
